name: Gale Reef
description: This place is truly incredible! It's a vast expanse in the open sea filled with an abundance of sea fans. It's a location exclusively for skilled divers due to its challenging conditions. A swift descent with rapid negative buoyancy is necessary for entry. It's important to note that anchors should not be utilized at this site.

name: Dawson's Reef
description: This wreck is of moderate size and features a solitary boiler adorned with stunning black coral. It is highly recommended for technical divers.

name: Claire's Reef
description: For novice divers looking to embark on their diving journey, this reef serves as an excellent starting point. It offers a shallow environment with a maximum depth of 30 feet, ensuring a comfortable and manageable experience. Moreover, this location boasts a diverse array of fish and other captivating marine creatures, making it an ideal spot for observing marine life.
